name: Powernaut VANGARDT (itch)
description:
A gameboy-inspired MegaMetroidSoulsvania

  • Incredible 4-color graphics. You thought Tetris looked good? Check this out!
  • Hardcore but totally fair platforming action!
  • Mind-bending password-based save system!
  • Fluid and intuitive level design inspired by the likes of Milon's Secret Castle, Simon's Quest, and Takeshi's Challenge.
